Pattern.name: Strategy
Pattern.Desc: Define a family of algorithms, encapsulate each one, and make them interchangeable. Strategy lets the algorithm vary independently from clients that use it.

Node.name: Strategy
Node.Desc: Declares an interface common to all supported algorithms.

Node.name: ConcreteStrategy
Node.Desc: Implements the algorithm using the Strategy interface.

Node.name: Context
Node.Desc: Is configured with a ConcreteStrategy object.
